content: length eyes in black yarn or embroidery floss embroider eyes onto the head before of after stuffing version 2013 02 07 5 of 7 croc size 3 75 hook body in dark green yarn we are starting at the base mc with 6 single_crochet r1 6 increase 12 r2 1 increase 1 single_crochet * 18 r3 1 increase 2 single_crochet * 24 r4 1 increase 3 single_crochet * 30 now we start to go upwards r5 this row only in back loop 30 single_crochet 30 r6 30 single_crochet 30 r7 3 single_crochet 1 decrease * 24 r8 24 single_crochet 24 r9 2 single_crochet 1 decrease * 18 r10 13 18 single_crochet 18 r14 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 12 r15 16 12 single_crochet 12 fo leave a tail long enough to sew the body to the head head in dark green yarn the head is started from the back mc with 6 single_crochet r1 6 increase 12 r2 2 increase 2 single_crochet * 18 r3 3 increase 3 single_crochet * 27 this row makes the ears r4 4 increase 3 single_crochet **3 in 1 1 single_crochet turn start in last single_crochet of the 3 in 1 3 increase 1 single_crochet turn start in last single_crochet of 3rd increase 6 single_crochet start back in regular row** 2 single_crochet repeat from ** to ** 4 single_crochet 4 increase 5 single_crochet ~42 r5 7 42 single_crochet 42 r8 4 decrease 2 single_crochet 9 decrease 2 single_crochet 4 decrease 25 this could be a good time to start stuffing the head r9 12 decrease 1 single_crochet 13 r10 decrease until there are 8 stitches 8 r11 18 8 single_crochet 8 r19 4 single_crochet 3 in 1 3 in 1 1 single_crochet 11 r20 2 decrease 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 6 fo stitch on two nostrils to the end of the nose using black yarn or embroidery floss eyes make 2 small bits of white and black yarn mc with 5 single_crochet white yarn r1 5 increase 10 fo leave tail to sew on to the head to get small black pupils 1 with a small piece of black yarn sew from the back to the front slightly through some of the yarn on the side of the center hole version 2013 02 07 6 of 7 2 tie a knot in the black yarn 3 thread the yarn back through slightly off from the center of the eye on the other side of the center from step one 4 knot both ends of the thread on the back side of the eye leave the tail for now when you sew the eyes on to the head you can tuck in extra yarn tails behind them to help them bug out a little extra belly in light green yarn the beginning yarn tail can be short tuck in in under the belly piece when you sew it on chain 2 r1 1 single_crochet 1 r2 chain 1 turn 1 increase 2 r3
